alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 31 at 9:06PM PST until January 01 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For tonight, north to northwest winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts of 45 to 55 mph expected, strongest in the Interstate 5 corridor. Then winds shifting to northeast on Saturday morning, with gusts in the 35 to 50 mph range, strongest in the Highway 14 corridor * WHERE...Ventura County Mountains and Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 2 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Major roadways impacted by the strong winds include interstate 5 and highway 14.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range; Ventura County Mountains
